snippet.title: Into the Radius VR - Cinematic Teaser
snippet.description:
#Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1012790/Into_the_Radius_VR/

#Oculus https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/2004005749696280/

#Viveport (Coming Soon): https://www.viveport.com/apps/8718ad68-0dd9-47b0-aac1-10f4d809afe5/Into_The_Radius_VR/

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/6pZ3CsQ

#IntotheRadius is a single-player #VR game blending eldritch horror in a post-apocalyptic ex-soviet setting. Story driven, open-world hardcore gameplay with realistic guns. Unravel the mystery of the Radius as you explore, collect artifacts and survive inside a zone filled with dangerous anomalies.

Find out more at: http://Pechorsk.zone

https://www.facebook.com/IntotheRadius/
https://twitter.com/intotheradius
https://www.instagram.com/intotheradius_vr/
https://www.reddit.com/r/intotheradius/
https://www.twitch.tv/intotheradius


Soundtrack: 
"Haunting Atmospheric Background Music - Wake Up In the Dark" by CO.AG Music
